import React from 'react' import { Button, Header, Image, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' function ModalImage() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) return ( setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} > Select a Photo

We've found the following gravatar image associated with your e-mail address.

Is it okay to use this photo?
